tasks.dev: deno run --watch --allow-env --allow-net --allow-read main.ts -o ./pub/css/app.css & deno run tailwind & deno run esbuild
tasks.serve: deno run --allow-net --allow-env --allow-read main.ts & deno run -A npm:tailwindcss -i ./app/css/app.css --minify & deno run -A npm:esbuild --minify ./app/scripts/main.ts --outdir=./pub/scripts/
